items.title: Spoils shared between Rangers and Celtic as Glasgow City go top of SWPL
items.description: Rangers and Celtic played out a 1-1 draw in Sunday’s Glasgow derby at Broadwood — a result that ultimately did little to aid either side’s ambitions in a fiercely contested SWPL title race.
